newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Slovenian BTC says H1 net profit down 27 pct.
newsitem.headline: Slovenian BTC says H1 net profit down 27 pct.

text.p: Slovenian warehousing firm BTC said on Wednesday its half-year net profit fell to 443.5 million tolars ($3.3 million) from 607.6 million tolars in the same period of 1995.
"The profit was down because we had large investments in the first half of this year," Helena Petrin, BTC's general secretary, told Reuters.
She said the company invested about $1.3 million in various buildings in Slovenia.
BTC's turnover eased to two billion tolars from 2.06 billion in the first half of 1995. -- Marja Novak, Ljubljana newsroom, 386-61-125-8439
